>> i have those gmod screen shots but still dont know how to use them 
I think he means how to get to the screenshots..
If you don't know how to get to your Gmod Screenshots you go to
Steam> Right-click "Garry's Mod"> "View Screenshots..."
Then you can view them from there or press the "Show on Disk" button on the window.
